Package cs2030.simulator

Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
cs2030.simulator.Simulator
public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
Simulator handles a priority queue of events and updates the servers and queue based on the server's response.

  • Constructor Details

    • Simulator

      public Simulator()

  • Method Details

    • simulate

      public static void simulate​(int seed, int noServers, int noSelf, int max, int customers, double arrivalRate, double serviceRate, double restingRate, double probRest, double probGreedy)
      Sends each event in priority queue to be executed and adds new events back to queue.
      Parameters:
      seed - an int value representing the seed.
      noServers - an int value representing the number of servers
      noSelf - an int value representing the number of self-checkout counters.
      max - an int value for the maximum queue length
      customers - an int representing the number of customers.
      arrivalRate - a positive double parameter for the arrival rate, λ.
      serviceRate - a positive double parameter for the service rate, μ
      restingRate - a positive double parameter for the resting rate, ρ.
      probRest - a double parameter for the probability of resting, Pr.
      probGreedy - a double parameter for the probability of a greedy customer occurring, Pg.

    • getNextEvent

      private static Event getNextEvent​(Event e, Shop shop, Stats stats, cs2030.simulator.RandomGenerator rng)
      Sends each event in priority queue to be executed and returns new event.
      Parameters:
      e - previous event
      shop - contains all servers
      stats - contains stats of simulator
      rng - generate timings randomly
      Returns:
      next event

    • generateEvents

      private static java.util.PriorityQueue<Event> generateEvents​(int customers, cs2030.simulator.RandomGenerator rng, double probGreedy)
      Creates events containing customers.
      Parameters:
      customers - Number of customers
      rng - Generate arrival timings randomly
      probGreedy - Probability that customer created is a greedy customer.
      Returns:
      A priority queue of events

    • generateServers

      private static Shop generateServers​(int serverNo, int self, int max, double probRest)
      Creates servers within Shop.
      Parameters:
      serverNo - Number of HumanServers.
      self - number of SelfCheckoutServers.
      max - Maximum size of queue.
      probRest - Probability of a HumanServer resting.
      Returns:
      A Shop of servers.
